game.name: Bad Eye Deer
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Bad Eye Deer is a point and click survival horror game where you survive 3 nights, manage your 'energy' and 'temperature' levels, and keep your own eye out for any incoming threats.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Bad Eye Deer is a point and click survival horror game where you survive 3 nights, manage your 'energy' and 'temperature' levels, and keep your own eye out for any incoming threats.
